charges.charge_name: Conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug

offence_date.source: So has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown, between two dates, 1 and 2 October 2021 in Hong Kong.

offence_time.source: On 2 October 2021, at around 1.30 am, police officers patrolling near the Kwai Shing Circuit stopped and searched a taxi carrying the 1st defendant, So, as a passenger.

place_of_offence.address: Kwai Shing Circuit (stop/search location) and earlier meeting at 59 Prince Edward Road West
place_of_offence.source: On 2 October 2021, at around 1.30 am, police officers patrolling near the Kwai Shing Circuit stopped and searched a taxi carrying the 1st defendant, So... Earlier that day or the day before on 1 October she received two messages ... The defendant, Fu, instructed her to meet him at 59 Prince Edward Road West where he was to replenish her drug supply

reasons_for_offence.source: This friend’s mother offered her a job to make easy money, delivering drugs as instructed for $1,000 a day.

benefits_received.source: She also had HK$14,840 in cash and two mobile phones.

charges.charge_name: Conspiracy to traffic in dangerous drugs

offence_date.source: Lam has pleaded guilty to conspiracy to traffic in a dangerous drug, namely, cocaine and cannabis in a herbal form with Fu, the defendant of 316/2023, and other persons unknown between 22 September and 3 October 2021, both dates inclusive, in Hong Kong.

place_of_offence.address: Subdivided unit in Mongkok and collection near Tai Wai MTR Station
place_of_offence.source: They found a tenancy agreement dated 23 September 2021 signed by Fu and the 2nd defendant, Lam... he had been instructed by a person named “Siu Wan” at 5.30 earlier that day to collect this cocaine from a place near Tai Wai MTR Station. Then he was to take it back to the subdivided unit in Mongkok and repackage the drugs

reasons_for_offence.source: He told the police that both he and Fu met this Siu Wan who offered them both a way to make easy money.

benefits_received.source: He instructed them to rent the subdivided unit and provided money to buy digital scales and plastic bags.
